mapper.insert: insert into user(user_id, user_name, user_password, user_email, user_birth, user_admin, user_phone, user_joindate) values (#{user_id}, #{user_name}, #{user_password}, #{user_email}, #{user_birth},0,#{user_phone}, curdate())

insert into boards(boards_title, boards_content, boards_userid, boards_regdate, boards_readcnt, boards_category, del, boards_productid, boards_review_score) values(#{boards_title}, #{boards_content}, #{boards_userid}, curdate(), 0,1,0, #{boards_productid}, #{boards_review_score})
mapper.select: select count(*) from user where user_id = #{user_id};
